title: Promote current draft deployment to live

requirements.text: Promote the currently deployed draft version of the app to the live version so that the live app URL serves the latest draft build.
acceptanceCriteria: The latest draft build is promoted to live successfully.
Opening the live app URL shows the same app version and behavior as the most recent draft build.
No new 'draft-only' version remains as the active live deployment after promotion.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implement App Market / marketplace publishing (formal listing).
Add new product features unrelated to promoting the draft deployment to live.
